windowclass.name: lptableset_main

button_checkbox_column.name: default
button_checkbox_column.script: function onValueChanged(a) if getValue() == 1 then for _, node in pairs(DB.getChildren(".saved_lptableset")) do if node.getNodeName() ~= window.getDatabaseNode().getNodeName() then DB.setValue(node, "default", "number", 0) end end end end

linkfield.script: function onInit() local class, datasource = getValue() if datasource ~= nil then self.setSource(datasource) end end function onDrop(x, u, dragdata) if dragdata.isType("shortcut") then local class, datasource = dragdata.getShortcutData(); if class == "table" then self.clearSource() self.setSource(datasource) self.setValue(class, datasource) end end end function clearSource() local class, datasource = getValue() window[namecontrol[1]].setValue("") DB.removeHandler(datasource..".name", "onUpdate", self.handleNameChange) end function setSource(datasource) window[namecontrol[1]].setValue(DB.getValue(datasource..".name")) DB.addHandler(datasource..".name", "onUpdate", self.handleNameChange) end function handleNameChange(nodeChanged) window[namecontrol[1]].setValue(nodeChanged.getValue()) end
